comprehensive_overview: libgit2 is a portable, pure C implementation of the Git core methods provided as a re-entrant linkable library with a solid API, allowing you to write native speed custom Git applications in any language which supports C bindings.
core_features:
1. Portable and efficient Git core methods implementation.
2. Linkable library with a well-defined API.
3. Ability to write custom Git applications in various languages supporting C bindings.
